summary.para: Represents a control that helps user to visualize the single numerical data.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfCircularGauge.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfCircularGauge.GaugeHeader
member.summary: Gets or sets the header for CircularGauge.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfCircularGauge.GaugeHeaderPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the GaugeHeader of the SfCircularGauge.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfCircularGauge.SubScales
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of subscales to be added in the same gauge.
member.remarks: SubScale is used to add multiple scale in the same gauge.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfCircularGauge.MainScale

summary.para: Gets or sets the MainScale that specifies basic look and feel of Circular Gauge.

member.remarks: The MainScale contains Scale that integrates labels, tick marks and Rim to specify basic look and feel of Circular Gauge. It defines start angle, sweep direction and sweep angle and overall minimum and maximum values, as well as frequency of labels and tick marks to be drawn. It can has multiple Ranges. A range is a visual element which begins and ends at specified values within a scale. It can has one or more pointers to point out the values in the scale. It also has GaugeHeader that can be used to set a unique header for the Circular Gauge

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfCircularGauge.CircularScaleStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the style to the CircularScale in the SfCircularGauge.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfCircularGauge.SpacingMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets the outer margin of the SfCircularGauge.
member.remarks: SpacingMargin property is used to place the SfCircularGauge in the center of the container. And also it decides the size of the SfCircularGauge. Value of the property should reside between 0.1 and 1.0. The default value is 1.0.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPanel
member.summary: CircularPanel is used to arrange the CircularScale elements.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPanel.ScaleMaxWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets ScaleMaxWidth of the CircularPanel which help to position the SfCircularGauge elements.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPanel.SweepDirection
member.summary: Gets or sets SweepDirection of the CircularPanel which decides rendering direction of the CircularScale elements.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPanel.SweepAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets SweepAngle of the CircularPanel which decides the shape of the SfCircularGauge.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPanel.StartAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the StartAngle of the CircularPanel which decides the shape of the SfCircularGauge.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPanel.AngularSpace
member.summary: Gets or sets the AngularSpace between two children of the CircularPanel.

summary.para: CircularPointer is a class that includes properties and methods to define different types of pointers

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.RangePointerStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of the RangePointer of the CircularPointer.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.RangePointerStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush that describes the RangePointerStroke of the CircularPointer.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.SymbolPointerStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush that describes the SymbolPointerStroke of the CircularPointer.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.NeedlePointerStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness value of the NeedlePointer of the CircularPointer.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.NeedlePointerStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush that describes the NeedlePointerStroke of the CircularPointer.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.PointerCapStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush that describes the PointerCapStroke of the CircularPointer.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.RangePointerVisibility
member.summary: Gets or sets user interface (UI) visibility of RangePointer.
member.remarks: There are three types of pointers. While choosing a pointer using the PointerType property the other two pointers' visibility property will be set to Collapsed. Default value is Visible.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.SymbolPointerVisibility
member.summary: Gets or sets the user interface (UI) visibility of SymbolPointer.
member.remarks: There are three types of pointers. While choosing a pointer using the PointerType property the other two pointers' visibility property will be set to Collapsed. Default value is Visible.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.NeedlePointerVisibility
member.summary: Gets or sets user interface visibility of the NeedlePointer.
member.remarks: There are three types of pointers. While choosing a pointer using the PointerType property the other two pointers' visibility property will be set to Collapsed. Default value is Visible.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.PointerType
member.summary: Gets or sets Type of the CircularPointer.
member.remarks: There are three types of pointers. User can choose a pointer using the PointerType property. Options are 1. NeedlePointer (Default) 2. RangePointer 3. Symbolointer

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the Value that decides the position of the CircularPointer in the CircularScale.
member.remarks: Value property is one of the most important property. Based on the Value property pointer has been positioned on the CircularScale. Value should resides between the start and end value of the scale. If the value of this property is less than StartValue of the CircularScale, then the StartValue of the CircularScale is set to the Value of the pointer. Similarly EndValue of the CircularScale is set to the Value of the pointer when Value is greater that EndValue of the scale.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.NeedleLengthFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which helps to calculate the NeedleLength of the CircularPointer.

remarks.para: NeedleLengthFactor property is used to calculate the NeedleLength based on the size of the SfCircularGauge. Value of the property should reside between 0.1 and 1.0. The default value is 0.75.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.SymbolPointerHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the SymbolPointerHeight value that decides the size of the SymbolPointer .

remarks.para: This property used to change the size of the SymbolPointer.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.SymbolPointerWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the SymbolPointerWidth value that decides the size of the SymbolPointer .

remarks.para: This property used to change the size of the SymbolPointer.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.Symbol
member.summary: Gets or sets the Symbol value that decides the shape of the SymbolPointer .

remarks.para: This property used to change the symbol of the SymbolPointer.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.SymbolPointerTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for the custom symbol for the SymbolPointer.
member.remarks: SymbolPointerTemplate will get applied when the Symbol property of the CircularPointer is set to Custom.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.PointerCapDiameter
member.summary: Gets or sets the PointerCapDiameter value that decides the size of the PointerCap of the NeedlePointer .

remarks.para: This property used to change the size of the NeedlePointer cap.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointer.EnableAnimation
member.summary: Gets or sets value indicating whether this element can be animated.

remarks.para: EnableAnimation property is used to animate the movement of the pointer when the Value is of the pointer is changed. Its default value is true.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularPointerCollection
member.summary: It is a collection that contains a set of Pointers that can be used to point values in CircularScale .

member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularRange
member.summary: CircularRange is a class that denotes various qualitative ranges for a CircularScale.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularRange.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularRange.StartValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the Value of the CircularRange's StartValue.
member.remarks: A range is a visual element which begins and ends at specified values within a scale. These start and end values are set by the StartValue and EndValue properties of Range

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularRange.EndValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the Value of the CircularRange's EndValue.
member.remarks: A range is a visual element which begins and ends at specified values within a scale. These start and end values are set by the StartValue and EndValue properties of Range

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularRange.EndAngle
member.summary: Gets value of the CircularRange's EndAngle.
member.remarks: EndAngle is a read only property used to get the value of the range's EndAngle.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularRange.StartPoint
member.summary: Gets Pointvalue of the CircularRange's StartPoint.
member.remarks: StartPoint is a read only property used to get the value of the StartPoint.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularRange.EndPoint
member.summary: Gets pointvalue of the CircularRange's EndPoint.
member.remarks: EndPoint is a read only property used to get the value of the EndPoint.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularRange.Size
member.summary: Gets Size of the CircularRange which helps to position the CircularRange.
member.remarks: Size is a read only property used to get the value of the Size.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularRange.Stroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush that describes the Stroke value of the CircularRange.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularRange.StrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets thickness of the RangeStroke.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularRangeCollection
member.summary: It is a collection that contains a set of Ranges that can be used to specifiy various ranges of CircularScale .

member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale
member.summary: It contains collection of ranges, pointers, labels, and ticks that help to visualize the data.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: New instance of the CircularRangeCollection, CircularPointerCollection, CircularScaleTickCollection, CircularScaleLabelCollection classes are initialized.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.NumericScaleType
member.summary: Gets or sets the numeric scale type of the scale.
member.remarks: Default value of this property is Auto. This property remains active only when EnableSmartLabels property is set to true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.EnableSmartLabels
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display smart labels or not .
member.remarks: This property helps to set the Numeric scale type to the labels displayed in scale

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.NoOfFractionalDigit
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of fractional digit has to be displayed in the Scale labels..
member.remarks: Default value of this property is 1. If the values have large no of fractional values then the fractional value count is reduced to one.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.RimStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush that describes the RimStroke value of the CircularScale.
member.remarks: RimStroke property will remains effective until the value of the RangePostion property is not set to 'SetAsScaleRim'.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.RimStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of the RimStroke.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.LabelPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets LabelPosition that decides the position of Labels in the CircularScale.
member.remarks: The Labels in the scale can be placed inside the scale or outside the scale by choosing the options avail in the LabelPosition property. Options are 1. Inside (Default) : Places the Labels inside the scale. 2. Outside : Places the Labels outside the scale.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.TickPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets TickPosition that decides the position of ticks in the CircularScale.
member.remarks: The Ticks in the scale can be placed inside the scale, outside or on top of the scale by choosing the options avail in the TickPosition property. Options are 1. Inside (Default) : Places the Ticks inside the scale. 2. Outside : Places the Ticks outside the scale. 3. Cross : Places the Ticks on top of the scale.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.RangePointerPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets RangePointerPosition that decides the position of RangePointer in the CircularScale.
member.remarks: The RangePointer in the scale can be placed inside the scale or outside the scale by choosing the options avail in the RangePointerPosition property. Options are 1. Inside (Default) : Places the RangePointer inside the scale. 2. Outside : Places the RangePointer outside the scale.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.RangePosition
member.summary: Gets or sets RangePosition that decides the position of ranges in the CircularScale.
member.remarks: The Ranges in the scale can be placed inside the scale or outside the scale by choosing the options avail in the RangePosition property. Options are 1. Inside (Default) : Places the Ranges inside the scale. 2. Outside : Places the Ranges outside the scale. 3. SetAsScaleRim : Placed the Ranges on the Scale Rim.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.Ranges
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of Ranges to the CircularScale.
member.remarks: A range is a visual element which begins and ends at specified values within a scale. These start and end values are set by the StartValue and EndValue properties of Range. Range’s UI is customized by the Stroke and StrokeThickness Properties.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.Pointers
member.summary: Gets or sets collection of Pointers to the CircularScale.
member.remarks: User can add multiple pointers to the gauge to point at multiple values on the same scale. This can be useful for showing a low and a high value at the same time. Value of the pointer is set by the Value property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.SweepDirection
member.summary: Gets or sets SweepDirection that decides the rendering direction of the elements in CircularScale.
member.remarks: SweepDirection property decides in which direction labels and ticks have to be rendered in the CircularScale.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.SweepAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the SweepAngle of the CircularScale that decides the shape of the SfCircularGauge
member.remarks: By setting the StartAngle, SweepDirection and SweepAngle we can shape the Circular Gauge into Full Circular Gauge, Half Circular Gauge, and Quarter Circular Gauge.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.StartAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the StartAngle of the CircularScale that decides the shape of the SfCircularGauge.
member.remarks: By setting the StartAngle, SweepDirection and SweepAngle we can shape the Circular Gauge into Full Circular Gauge, Half Circular Gauge, and Quarter Circular Gauge.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.EndPoint
member.summary: Gets EndPoint of the CircularScale.
member.remarks: EndPoint is a read only property used to get the value of the EndPoint.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.StartPoint
member.summary: Gets or sets StartPoint of the CircularScale.
member.remarks: StartPoint is a read only property used to get the value of the StartPoint.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.BindRangeStrokeToLabels
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Range Stroke applied to Labels Stroke

remarks.para: The Scale should have atleast one range to make the property effective.
Value asTrue: Range Stroke is applied to the labels which are in the appropriate range.
Value asFalse: Default or user defined Stroke is applied to the labels.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.BindRangeStrokeToTicks
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Range Stroke applied to Ticks Stroke

remarks.para: The Scale should have atleast one range to make the property effective.
Value asTrue: Range Stroke is applied to the Ticks which are in the appropriate range.
Value asFalse: Default or user defined Stroke is applied to the Ticks.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.TickLength
member.summary: Gets or sets value that decides the length of the ticks in the CircularScale.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.SmallTickLength
member.summary: Gets or sets value that decides the length of the small ticks in the CircularScale.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.TickStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush that describes the TickStroke of the CircularScale.
member.remarks: TickStroke property will remains effective until the value of the BindRangeStrokeToTicks property is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.LabelStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush that describes the Stroke value of the Labels.
member.remarks: LabelStroke property will remains effective until the value of the BindRangeStrokeToLabels property is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.SmallTickStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush that describes the SmallTickStroke of the CircularScale.
member.remarks: SmallTickStroke property will remains effective until the value of the BindRangeStrokeToTicks property is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.TickStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of the TickStroke.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.SmallTickStrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of the SmallTickStroke.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.StartValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the StartValue of the CircularScale that decides the overall range of the scale.
member.remarks: StartValue and EndValue properties will decides the overall range of the Circular Rim

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.LabelPostfix
member.summary: Gets or sets the LabelPostfix value that can attached at the end of the labels.
member.remarks: Used to add some extentions to the labels like % symbol can be added to labels while displaying the percentage values in SfCircularGauge.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.LabelPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the LabelPrefix value that can be added before the labels.
member.remarks: Used to add some prefix to the labels like $ symbol can be added to labels while displaying the dollar values in SfCircularGauge.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.EndValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the EndValue of the CircularScale that decides the overall range of the scale.
member.remarks: StartValue and EndValue properties will decides the overall range of the Circular Rim

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.Interval
member.summary: Gets or sets the Interval value of the CircularScale that used to calculate the Tick count.
member.remarks: Interval property is used to calculate the Tick count for a scale based on StartValue and EndValue.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.CircularScale.MinorTicksPerInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that used to calculate the MinorTicks count in the scale.
member.remarks: MinorTicksPerInterval property is used to calculate the MinorTicks count for a scale based on StartValue and EndValue.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfDigitalGauge.EnableRTLFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should enable Right To Left support or not. This is a dependency Property.
member.remarks: Default value for EnableRTLFormat is False

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfDigitalGauge.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that digital gauge should display. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfDigitalGauge.CharacterType
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether character should contain seven or fourteen segments or sixteen segment or in Eight cross Eight Matrix. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfDigitalGauge.CharacterHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the characters. This is a dependency property.
member.remarks: The Value Should be in Positive.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfDigitalGauge.CharacterWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the characters. This is a dependency property.
member.remarks: The Value Should be in Positive.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfDigitalGauge.CharactersSpacing
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance between characters. This is a dependency property.
member.remarks: The Character Spacing Should be in Positive else it act as RTLFormat

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfDigitalGauge.CharacterStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush used to color the bright segments.This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfDigitalGauge.DimmedBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush used to color the dimmed segments.This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfDigitalGauge.DimmedBrushOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the opacity for the dimmed segments. This is a dependency property.
member.remarks: The property gets and sets the percentage of opacity to be set in the dimmed segments.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfDigitalGauge.SegmentThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of character segments. This is a dependency property.
member.remarks: It does not supports for Eight Cross Eight Segment. If the Segment thickness is negative then it will set the value as 2, if 0 the character is not visible. It also depends on CharacterHeight and CharacterWidth Properties.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfDigitalGauge.SkewAngleX
member.summary: Gets or sets the angle to skew the characters along the x-axis. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SfDigitalGauge.SkewAngleY
member.summary: Gets or sets the angle to skew the characters along the y-axis. This is a dependency property.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SquaredPanel
member.summary: SquaredPanel is used to arrange the SfCircularGauge.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SquaredPanel.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SquaredPanel.GetSpacing(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Returns the SpacingProperty value of the DependencyObject that used to arrange and position the DependencyObject

returns.para: It returns the SpacingProperty value of the DependencyObject.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.SquaredPanel.SetSpacing(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the value of a SpacingProperty, specified by its SpacingProperty identifier.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.TickLinesPanel
member.summary: TickLinesPanel is used to arrange the TickLines.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.TickLinesPanel.SweepDirection
member.summary: Gets or sets SweepDirection of the TickLinesPanel which decides the rendering direction of the ticks.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.TickLinesPanel.SweepAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the SweepAngle of the TickLinesPanel which help to position the ticks.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.TickLinesPanel.StartAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the StartAngle of the TickLinesPanel which help to position the ticks.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Gauges.TickLinesPanel.AngularSpace
member.summary: Gets or sets the AngularSpace between two children of the TickLinesPanel.
